metadata.title: CVE-2021-37968 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Background Fetch API in Google Chrome priorto 94.0.4606.54 allowed a remote attacker to leak cross-origin data via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
